holidays.title: Still Need To Do Day
holidays.description: Christmas is over, and you should be feeling calm. So what’s that subtle itch inside you?

holidays.title: Constitution of Ireland
holidays.description: The Constitution of Ireland is a document that defines the rights of the people.

holidays.title: International Cello Day
holidays.description: Join us in celebrating Pablo Casals — the greatest cellist of all time.

holidays.title: Mongolia Independence Day
holidays.description: The history of Mongolia’s Independence Day demonstrates the challenges of achieving freedom.

holidays.title: National Ha Day
holidays.description: National Ha Day is coming up, so get ready to celebrate your friends named Ha!

holidays.title: National Paula Day
holidays.description: Paula, a classic name,  is liked by several people in different parts of the world.

holidays.title: National Pepper Pot Day
holidays.description: Get your bowls out and keep your soup spoons ready to fill up on Pepper Pot Soup!

holidays.title: Tick Tock Day
holidays.description: Get your checklist and pen out and get ready to tick your tasks off the list.

holidays.title: Candace Rice’s Birthday
holidays.description: Candace Rice is a model turned actress, with a hunger for more success!

holidays.title: Davina Potratz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Who wouldn’t dream of being an accomplished model, actress, and real estate agent?

holidays.title: Jude Law’s Birthday
holidays.description: Starting in theaters, he has now become one of the most renowned actors in the world.

holidays.title: Mary Tyler Moore’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her charming bright smile graced the big screen and left her mark on history.

holidays.title: Minatozaki Sana’s Birthday
holidays.description: Leaving her hometown to chase a dream, the young girl has now become a shining star.

holidays.title: Pardison Fontaine’s Birthday
holidays.description: Pardison Fontaine is now the producer of choice for the best rappers in the game.

holidays.title: Pimp C’s Birthday
holidays.description: Although his life was short, he had become a great inspiration to many others.

holidays.title: Ross Lynch’s Birthday
holidays.description: He acts. He sings. He dances. He is capable of doing anything and he does it well.

holidays.title: Ted Danson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ted Danson lights up every project he's involved in. What's next in his prolific career?
